text: KidsTv.
Hey boom buddies, what do you wanna do today?
Ooh ooh let’s go ice skating!
I wanna fly a rocket into outer space!
How about the beach??
Why don’t we do it all?? let’s go!!
5 Little Boom Buddies laughing in the sun
They just wanna have some fun!
All of their adventures have just begun
Let’s go Boom Buddies RUN RUN RUN!!
Haha, this is fun!
First stop...the beach!
Oh i love the beach
let’s go….

5 LITTLE BOOM BOOM BUDDIES
YEAH..
5 LITTLE BOOM BOOM BUDDIES

5 Little Boom Buddies playing by the sea
Just as happy as can be
Feeling really awesome running wild and free
Let’s swim Boom Buddies ONE TWO THREE!!!
Woo, this is awesome!
Ok guys, now let’s go to my favorite place
A winter wonderland!......

We better wrap up warm!
 here we go

5 LITTLE BOOM BOOM BUDDIES
YEAH..
5 LITTLE BOOM BOOM BUDDIES
5 Little Boom Buddies skating on the ice
In a snow-filled Paradise
Twirling all around feeling oh so nice!
Let’s skate Boom Buddies DON’T THINK TWICE!
Wow this is so much fun!!
Yeah! where are we going next??
I know, follow me!!......

5 LITTLE BOOM BOOM BUDDIES
YEAH..
5 LITTLE BOOM BOOM BUDDIES

5 Little Boom Buddies soaring into space
On a rocket built to race

All of them are floating all about the place
Let’s go Boom Buddies FEEL THE BASS!
How cooool! i always wanted to go to outer-space!
Ok boom buddies, we have time for one last adventure…..
Let’s make it a good one - here we go guys!

5 LITTLE BOOM BOOM BUDDIES
YEAH...
5 LITTLE BOOM BOOM BUDDIES

5 Little Boom Buddies rockin out a song
Everybody sings along
If you’re one of us, shout it good and strong…...

WITH THE BOOM BUDDIES I BE-LONG!
WITH THE BOOM BUDDIES I BE-LONG!
Aw, you guys are the best friends a kid could ever ask for!!
I love you boom buddies!
